data.name: Moontrain Demo
data.detailed_description:
Moontrain is a dynamic point & click adventure game. The story follows a detective who needs to solve an impossible case. Everyone who tried to solve it had no luck, maybe you are just the detective we need.
Enter a surreal and mysterious world. Try to find clues and solve puzzles. Play challenging mini games that are not just for fun, this is serious detective work.

The Moontrain is departing from the station, all aboard!
data.about_the_game:
Moontrain is a dynamic point & click adventure game. The story follows a detective who needs to solve an impossible case. Everyone who tried to solve it had no luck, maybe you are just the detective we need.
Enter a surreal and mysterious world. Try to find clues and solve puzzles. Play challenging mini games that are not just for fun, this is serious detective work.

The Moontrain is departing from the station, all aboard!
data.short_description: A Point n Click game set in a strange new world. All Aboard the new, exciting and strange adventure. Keep your hands, quills and tentacles inside for the whole ride.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (Windows Update Recommended)
  • Processor: 2Ghz i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
